data.title: Top 10: Famous Australian Actors and Actresses
data.meta_description: Australia is home to many artists that are renowned in the movie industry. Discover more about the Aussie stars on the big screens in Hollywood.
data.text:
We have already talked about the famous Australian singers and bands but now itâ€™s time to talk about the Aussie stars on the big screens in Hollywood.

Australia is home to many artists that are renowned in the movie industry.

Are you curious to know more about it? Have a look at our list of Top 10 Famous Australian Actors and Actresses! ğŸ¥

Photo by Pixabay on Pexels

1. CHRIS HEMSWORTH

Best known for playing â€œThorâ€ in The Avengers series, Chris Hemsworth was born in Melbourne in the state of Victoria. The most recent movie â€œAvengers: Endgameâ€ made him become one of the highest-paid actors in the world.

Chris Hemsworth started his career appearing in television series. He began acting in a famous soap opera in Australia called â€œHome and Awayâ€.

In 2009, Chris Hemsworth decided to pursue a career in Hollywood.

Movies: â€œThorâ€, â€œThe Avengersâ€, â€œThor: Ragnarokâ€, â€œAvengers: Endgameâ€, â€œExtractionâ€, â€œMen in Black: Internationalâ€, â€œRushâ€, among others.

Trailer: â€œThor: Ragnarokâ€

2. LIAM HEMSWORTH

As well as his older brother Chris, Liam Hemsworth was born in Melbourne.

Before becoming a star in Hollywood, Liam started playing a role in the Australian soap opera â€œNeighboursâ€. The Aussie star moved to Los Angeles with Chris Hemsworth to start his career in the movie industry.

The movie â€œThe Last Songâ€ based on the Nicholas Sparks novel with the same name, was filmed with his former wife Miley Cyrus.

Movies: â€œThe Hunger Gamesâ€, â€œIsnâ€™t It Romanticâ€, â€œIndependence Day: Resurgenceâ€, â€œEmpire Stateâ€, among others.

Trailer: â€œThe Hunger Gamesâ€

3. REBEL WILSON

Born in Sydney, Rebel Wilson is a comedian, actress, producer, and writer.

Rebel studied at the Australian Theatre for Young People (ATYP) in New South Wales. In 2003, she moved to the United States to focus on film projects.

In 2012, became world-wide famous after starring in the movie â€œPitch Perfectâ€ with Anna Kendrick and Brittany Snow.

Movies: â€œPitch Perfectâ€, â€œThe Hustleâ€, â€œIsnâ€™t It Romanticâ€, â€œBridesmaidsâ€, â€œHow To Be Singleâ€, among others.

Trailer: â€œPitch Perfectâ€

4. NICOLE KIDMAN

Nicole Kidman was born in Hawaii (USA), while her Australian parents were temporarily in the United States on student visas.

Raised in Sydney, she studied at the Philip Street Theatre and also attended the Australian Theatre for Young People (ATYP). Nicole began her acting career in Australia in 1983 and it is a consecrated actress.

Her awards include an Academy Award, two Primetime Emmy Awards, and four Golden Globe Awards. She was listed among the highest-paid actresses in the world in 2006, 2018, and 2019.

Movies: â€œMoulin Rouge!â€, â€œBombshellâ€, â€œBewitchedâ€, â€œTo Die Forâ€, â€œBatman Foreverâ€, â€œAustraliaâ€, among others.

Trailer: â€œMoulin Rouge!â€

5. HUGH JACKMAN

Hugh Jackman is one of the most successful Australian actors in Hollywood. He was born in Sydney and became famous after his superhero roles in movies.

Also, the actor collects multiple awards and nominations, including a nomination for the Academy Award for Best Actor for his work in the movie â€œLes MisÃ©rablesâ€ (2012).

However, he is mostly known for playing â€œWolverineâ€, a role for which he holds the Guinness World Record for â€œlongest career as a live-action Marvel superheroâ€.

Movies: â€œThe Wolverineâ€, â€œLoganâ€, â€œX-Menâ€, â€œThe Greatest Showmanâ€, â€œLes MisÃ©rablesâ€, â€œVan Helsingâ€, â€œAustraliaâ€, among others.

Trailer: â€œThe Wolverineâ€

6. MARGOT ROBBIE

The actress Margot Robbie was born in Dalby, in the state of Queensland. During her teenage years, Margot moved to Melbourne to pursue an acting career.

Her first appearance was in the Australian soap opera â€œNeighboursâ€ in 2008. The Aussie actress became internationally famous after starring in the movie â€œThe Wolf of Wall Streetâ€ with Leonardo DiCaprio.

In 2017, Time magazine named her one of the 100 most influential people in the world, and in 2019, she was ranked among the worldâ€™s highest-paid actresses.

Movies: â€œThe Suicide Squadâ€, â€œHarley Quinn: Birds of Preyâ€, â€œBombshellâ€, â€œFocusâ€, â€œThe Wolf of Wall Streetâ€, â€œOnce Upon a Time in Hollywoodâ€, among others.

Trailer: â€œHarley Quinn: Birds of Preyâ€

7. CATE BLANCHETT

Considered one of the most recognizable and talented actresses in Australia, Cate Blanchett was born in Melbourne.

During her career, Cate has won many awards, including two Academy Awards, three Golden Globe Awards, and three British Academy Film Awards.

In 2008, she received a star in the Hollywood Walk of Fame in Los Angeles.

Movies: â€œThe Aviatorâ€, â€œThe Curious Case of Benjamin Buttonâ€, â€œThe Lord of The Ringsâ€ (Trilogy), â€œThe Hobbitâ€ (Trilogy), among others.

Trailer: â€œThe Curious Case of Benjamin Buttonâ€

8. HEATH LEDGER

Heath Ledger was an Australian actor, photographer, and music video director. He was born in Perth, in the state of Western Australia.

His breakthrough movie was â€œThe Dark Knightâ€ in the role as â€œJokerâ€, which made him become highly successful and popular among fans and critics.

Unfortunately, the actor passed away in 2008 due to an accidental overdose.

Movies: â€œThe Dark Knightâ€, â€œ10 Things I Hate About Youâ€, â€œBrokeback Mountainâ€, â€œA Knightâ€™s Taleâ€, among others.

Trailer: â€œThe Dark Knightâ€

9. RUBY ROSE

Born in Melbourne, Ruby Rose is an actress, model, and television presenter.

She became famous as a VJ on MTV Australia and co-hosted TV shows such as â€œAustraliaâ€™s Next Top Modelâ€ and â€œThe Projectâ€ on Australian TV.

However, her international fame came when she acted in the series â€œOrange is The New Blackâ€ on Netflix.

Movies: â€œResident Evil: The Final Chapterâ€, â€œJohn Wick: Chapter 2â€, â€œPitch Perfect 3â€, among others.

Trailer: â€œResident Evil: The Final Chapterâ€

10. OLIVIA NEWTON-JOHN

Olivia Newton-John is a British-Australian singer, songwriter, actress, dancer, entrepreneur, and activist.

She was born in Cambridge, in the United Kingdom but her family moved to Melbourne in Australia when she was six years old.

In 1978, Olivia starred in the musical film â€œGreaseâ€ with John Travolta, leading her to fame. The soundtrack of the movie is one of the most successful in history.

She also has a consolidated musical career and sold 100 million records worldwide, making her one of the worldâ€™s best-selling artists of all time.

Movies: â€œGreaseâ€, â€œXanaduâ€, â€ Two of a Kindâ€, among others.

Trailer: â€œGreaseâ€
